Perfect! I now have all the information I need to assess the complexity. Let me analyze this task:

## Analysis

**Task**: Build a 3-tier pricing section component (Starter, Professional, Enterprise cards)
**Reference Design**: Clear visual design provided in 03-pricing.png
**Project Context**: React + TypeScript frontend with Emotion styling and Material-UI

### Key Findings:

1. **Scope**: Pure frontend UI component
   - Creating a single PricingSection component with 3 card variants
   - No backend API integration (pricing is static/hardcoded in design)
   - No data fetching or state management complexity
   - Uses existing Material-UI and Emotion libraries

2. **Integration**: None
   - No external services
   - No new dependencies needed
   - Follows existing project patterns

3. **Infrastructure**: None
   - No Docker, database, or configuration changes

4. **Knowledge**: Straightforward
   - React component patterns already established in codebase
   - Emotion and Material-UI patterns already in use
   - Design is clear and specific - no research needed

5. **Risk**: Low
   - Pure UI component with no security implications
   - Cannot break existing functionality
   - No data handling

### Complexity Level: **SIMPLE** âœ“

This is a straightforward UI component implementation following an existing design with no integrations, infrastructure changes, or architectural complexity.

1â†’# Quick Spec: 3-Tier Pricing Section
     2â†’
     3â†’## Overview
     4â†’
     5â†’Build a 3-tier pricing section component with Starter, Professional, and Enterprise cards following the design reference (03-pricing.png). This component will provide a reusable pricing display for the application with three distinct tiers, each with customizable pricing, features, and call-to-action buttons.
     6â†’
     7â†’## Workflow Type
     8â†’
     9â†’Feature implementation - Creating a new reusable UI component for pricing tier display.
    10â†’
    11â†’## Task Scope
    12â†’
    13â†’### Files to Modify/Create
    14â†’- `frontend/src/components/ui/PricingSection.tsx` - New component with pricing card variants
    15â†’- `frontend/src/components/ui/index.ts` - Export PricingSection component
    16â†’
    17â†’### Change Details
    18â†’Create a reusable PricingSection component with:
    19â†’- **PricingCard**: Base card component for individual pricing tiers with:
    20â†’  - Tier name (Starter, Professional, Enterprise)
    21â†’  - Price display
    22â†’  - Features list
    23â†’  - CTA button
    24â†’  - Optional highlight/featured styling for Professional tier
    25â†’- **PricingSection**: Container component that renders all three tiers in a responsive grid layout
    26â†’
    27â†’Style using Material-UI `styled` API and follow existing component patterns (similar to Card, KPICard).
    28â†’
    29â†’## Success Criteria
    30â†’
    31â†’- [ ] Component renders all three pricing tiers (Starter, Professional, Enterprise)
    32â†’- [ ] Professional tier is highlighted/featured
    33â†’- [ ] Responsive layout works on mobile and desktop
    34â†’- [ ] Button styling matches existing Button component patterns
    35â†’- [ ] No TypeScript errors
    36â†’- [ ] Component is properly exported from ui/index.ts
    37â†’
    38â†’### Implementation Notes
    39â†’- Use MUI Card as base component like other UI components
    40â†’- Professional tier should have visual distinction (e.g., shadow, scale, or highlight)
    41â†’- Features list should be flexible (array of strings)
    42â†’- CTA button text is customizable
    43â†’

1â†’import { Card as MuiCard, CardContent, CardHeader, CardActions, Box, Typography, Skeleton, SxProps, Theme } from '@mui/material'

     5â†’import TrendingFlatIcon from '@mui/icons-material/TrendingFlat'
     6â†’
     7â†’interface BaseCardProps {
     8â†’  children: React.ReactNode

    11â†’  hoverable?: boolean

    14â†’
    15â†’const StyledCard = styled(MuiCard, {
    16â†’  shouldForwardProp: (prop) => prop !== 'hoverable',
    17â†’})<{ hoverable?: boolean }>(({ theme, hoverable }) => ({
    18â†’  borderRadius: 12,
    19â†’  transition: 'all 200ms ease-out',
    20â†’  cursor: hoverable ? 'pointer' : 'default',
    21â†’  ...(hoverable && {
    22â†’    '&:hover': {
    23â†’      transform: 'translateY(-2px)',
    24â†’      boxShadow: theme.shadows[4],
    25â†’    },
    26â†’  }),
    27â†’}))
    28â†’
    29â†’export function Card({ children, hoverable = false, onClick, ...props }: BaseCardProps) {
    30â†’  return (
    31â†’    <StyledCard hoverable={hoverable} onClick={onClick} {...props}>
    32â†’      {children}
    33â†’    </StyledCard>
    34â†’  )
    35â†’}
    36â†’
    37â†’const GlassCard = styled(MuiCard)(({ theme }) => ({
    38â†’  background: alpha(theme.palette.background.paper, 0.85),
    39â†’  backdropFilter: 'blur(12px)',
    40â†’  border: `1px solid ${alpha(theme.palette.divider, 0.1)}`,
    41â†’  borderRadius: 16,
    42â†’  transition: 'all 200ms ease-out',
    43â†’}))
    44â†’
    45â†’export function GlassCardComponent({ children, ...props }: BaseCardProps) {
    46â†’  return <GlassCard {...props}>{children}</GlassCard>
    47â†’}
    48â†’
    49â†’interface KPICardProps {
    50â†’  title: string
    51â†’  value: string | number
    52â†’  trend?: number
    53â†’  trendLabel?: string
    54â†’  icon?: React.ReactNode
    55â†’  loading?: boolean
    56â†’  color?: 'primary' | 'success' | 'warning' | 'error' | 'info'
    57â†’  onClick?: () => void
    58â†’}
    59â†’
    60â†’export function KPICard({
    61â†’  title,
    62â†’  value,
    63â†’  trend,
    64â†’  trendLabel,
    65â†’  icon,
    66â†’  loading = false,
    67â†’  color = 'primary',
    68â†’  onClick,
    69â†’}: KPICardProps) {
    70â†’  const getTrendIcon = () => {
    71â†’    if (trend === undefined) return null
    72â†’    if (trend > 0) return <TrendingUpIcon fontSize="small" sx={{ color: 'success.main' }} />
    73â†’    if (trend < 0) return <TrendingDownIcon fontSize="small" sx={{ color: 'error.main' }} />
    74â†’    return <TrendingFlatIcon fontSize="small" sx={{ color: 'text.secondary' }} />
    75â†’  }
    76â†’
    77â†’  const getTrendColor = () => {
    78â†’    if (trend === undefined) return 'text.secondary'
    79â†’    if (trend > 0) return 'success.main'
    80â†’    if (trend < 0) return 'error.main'
    81â†’    return 'text.secondary'
    82â†’  }
    83â†’
    84â†’  if (loading) {
    85â†’    return (
    86â†’      <StyledCard>
    87â†’        <CardContent>
    88â†’          <Skeleton width={100} height={20} />
    89â†’          <Skeleton width={80} height={40} sx={{ mt: 1 }} />
    90â†’          <Skeleton width={60} height={16} sx={{ mt: 1 }} />
    91â†’        </CardContent>
    92â†’      </StyledCard>
    93â†’    )
    94â†’  }
    95â†’
    96â†’  return (
    97â†’    <StyledCard hoverable={!!onClick} onClick={onClick} sx={{ cursor: onClick ? 'pointer' : 'default' }}>
    98â†’      <CardContent sx={{ p: 2.5 }}>
    99â†’        <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'flex-start', justifyContent: 'space-between' }}>
   100â†’          <Box>
   101â†’            <Typography
   102â†’              variant="body2"
   103â†’              sx={{

   105â†’                fontWeight: 500,
   106â†’                fontSize: '0.8rem',
   107â†’                mb: 0.5,
   108â†’              }}
   109â†’            >
   110â†’              {title}
   111â†’            </Typography>
   112â†’            <Typography
   113â†’              variant="h4"
   114â†’              sx={{
   115â†’                fontWeight: 700,
   116â†’                color: 'text.primary',
   117â†’                lineHeight: 1.2,
   118â†’              }}
   119â†’            >
   120â†’              {value}
   121â†’            </Typography>
   122â†’          </Box>
   123â†’          {icon && (
   124â†’            <Box
   125â†’              sx={{
   126â†’                p: 1,
   127â†’                borderRadius: 2,
   128â†’                bgcolor: `${color}.main`,
   129â†’                color: 'white',
   130â†’                display: 'flex',
   131â†’                alignItems: 'center',
   132â†’                justifyContent: 'center',
   133â†’              }}
   134â†’            >
   135â†’              {icon}
   136â†’            </Box>
   137â†’          )}
   138â†’        </Box>
   139â†’        {trend !== undefined && (
   140â†’          <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: 0.5, mt: 1.5 }}>
   141â†’            {getTrendIcon()}
   142â†’            <Typography
   143â†’              variant="caption"
   144â†’              sx={{ color: getTrendColor(), fontWeight: 600 }}
   145â†’            >
   146â†’              {trend > 0 ? '+' : ''}{trend}%
   147â†’            </Typography>
   148â†’            {trendLabel && (
   149â†’              <Typography variant="caption" sx={{ color: 'text.secondary' }}>
   150â†’                {trendLabel}
   151â†’              </Typography>
   152â†’            )}
   153â†’          </Box>
   154â†’        )}
   155â†’      </CardContent>
   156â†’    </StyledCard>
   157â†’  )
   158â†’}
   159â†’
   160â†’interface FeatureCardProps {
   161â†’  icon: React.ReactNode
   162â†’  title: string
   163â†’  description: string
   164â†’  onClick?: () => void
   165â†’}
   166â†’
   167â†’export function FeatureCard({ icon, title, description, onClick }: FeatureCardProps) {
   168â†’  return (
   169â†’    <StyledCard hoverable onClick={onClick}>
   170â†’      <CardContent sx={{ p: 3 }}>
   171â†’        <Box
   172â†’          sx={{

   174â†’            height: 48,
   175â†’            borderRadius: 2,
   176â†’            bgcolor: 'primary.main',
   177â†’            color: 'white',
   178â†’            display: 'flex',
   179â†’            alignItems: 'center',

   183â†’        >
   184â†’          {icon}
   185â†’        </Box>
   186â†’        <Typography variant="h6" sx={{ fontWeight: 600, mb: 1 }}>

   196â†’
   197â†’interface ProjectCardProps {

     5â†’  variant?: 'primary' | 'secondary' | 'tertiary' | 'danger' | 'success'
     6â†’  loading?: boolean
     7â†’  icon?: React.ReactNode
     8â†’  iconPosition?: 'start' | 'end'
     9â†’}
    10â†’
    11â†’const StyledButton = styled(MuiButton)(() => ({
    12â†’  fontWeight: 600,
    13â†’  transition: 'all 200ms ease-out',
    14â†’  '&:hover': {
    15â†’    transform: 'translateY(-1px)',
    16â†’  },
    17â†’  '&:active': {
    18â†’    transform: 'scale(0.98)',
    19â†’  },
    20â†’  '&.Mui-disabled': {
    21â†’    transform: 'none',
    22â†’  },
    23â†’}))
    24â†’
    25â†’export function Button({
    26â†’  variant = 'primary',
    27â†’  loading = false,
    28â†’  icon,
    29â†’  iconPosition = 'start',
    30â†’  children,
    31â†’  disabled,
    32â†’  ...props
    33â†’}: ButtonProps) {
    34â†’  const getMuiVariant = (): MuiButtonProps['variant'] => {
    35â†’    switch (variant) {
    36â†’      case 'primary':
    37â†’      case 'danger':
    38â†’      case 'success':
    39â†’        return 'contained'
    40â†’      case 'secondary':
    41â†’        return 'outlined'
    42â†’      case 'tertiary':
    43â†’        return 'text'
    44â†’      default:
    45â†’        return 'contained'
    46â†’    }
    47â†’  }
    48â†’
    49â†’  const getColor = (): MuiButtonProps['color'] => {
    50â†’    switch (variant) {
    51â†’      case 'primary':
    52â†’        return 'primary'
    53â†’      case 'secondary':
    54â†’        return 'primary'
    55â†’      case 'tertiary':
    56â†’        return 'primary'
    57â†’      case 'danger':
    58â†’        return 'error'
    59â†’      case 'success':
    60â†’        return 'success'
    61â†’      default:
    62â†’        return 'primary'
    63â†’    }
    64â†’  }
    65â†’
    66â†’  const startIcon = icon && iconPosition === 'start' ? icon : undefined
    67â†’  const endIcon = icon && iconPosition === 'end' ? icon : undefined
    68â†’
    69â†’  return (
    70â†’    <StyledButton
    71â†’      variant={getMuiVariant()}
    72â†’      color={getColor()}
    73â†’      disabled={disabled || loading}
    74â†’      startIcon={loading ? <CircularProgress size={18} color="inherit" /> : startIcon}
    75â†’      endIcon={endIcon}
    76â†’      {...props}
    77â†’    >
    78â†’      {children}
    79â†’    </StyledButton>
    80â†’  )
    81â†’}
    82â†’
    83â†’export function IconButton({
    84â†’  children,
    85â†’  loading = false,
    86â†’  variant: _,
    87â†’  ...props
    88â†’}: Omit<ButtonProps, 'icon' | 'iconPosition'>) {
    89â†’  return (
    90â†’    <StyledButton
    91â†’      variant="contained"
    92â†’      color="primary"
    93â†’      disabled={props.disabled || loading}
    94â†’      sx={{
    95â†’        minWidth: 'auto',
    96â†’        p: 1,
    97â†’        ...props.sx,
    98â†’      }}
    99â†’      {...props}
   100â†’    >
   101â†’      {loading ? <CircularProgress size={20} color="inherit" /> : children}
   102â†’    </StyledButton>
   103â†’  )
   104â†’}

   158â†’        </Button>
   159â†’      </Box>

   161â†’  )

   163â†’
   164â†’interface PricingSectionProps {

   167â†’}
   168â†’
   169â†’const DEFAULT_PRICING_TIERS = [
   170â†’  {
   171â†’    tier: 'Starter',
   172â†’    price: '$9',
   173â†’    description: 'For individuals and small teams',
   174â†’    features: [
   175â†’      'Up to 5 projects',
   176â†’      '1 GB storage',
   177â†’      'Basic analytics',
   178â†’      'Community support',
   179â†’    ],
   180â†’    buttonText: 'Get Started',
   181â†’  },
   182â†’  {
   183â†’    tier: 'Professional',
   184â†’    price: '$49',
   185â†’    description: 'For growing teams',
   186â†’    features: [
   187â†’      'Unlimited projects',
   188â†’      '100 GB storage',
   189â†’      'Advanced analytics',
   190â†’      'Priority support',
   191â†’      'Custom integrations',
   192â†’      'Team collaboration',
   193â†’    ],
   194â†’    buttonText: 'Start Free Trial',
   195â†’    featured: true,
   196â†’  },
   197â†’  {
   198â†’    tier: 'Enterprise',
   199â†’    price: 'Custom',
   200â†’    description: 'For large organizations',
   201â†’    features: [
   202â†’      'Unlimited everything',
   203â†’      'Unlimited storage',
   204â†’      'Advanced analytics & reporting',
   205â†’      '24/7 dedicated support',
   206â†’      'Custom integrations',
   207â†’      'Single sign-on (SSO)',
   208â†’      'Custom contracts',
   209â†’    ],
   210â†’    buttonText: 'Contact Sales',
   211â†’  },
   212â†’]
   213â†’
   214â†’export function PricingSection({ spacing = 3, sx }: PricingSectionProps) {
   215â†’  return (
   216â†’    <Box sx={sx}>
   217â†’      <Grid container spacing={spacing}>
   218â†’        {DEFAULT_PRICING_TIERS.map((tierData) => (
   219â†’          <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={4} key={tierData.tier}>
   220â†’            <PricingCard
   221â†’              tier={tierData.tier}
   222â†’              price={tierData.price}

   224â†’              features={tierData.features}
   225â†’              buttonText={tierData.buttonText}
   226â†’              featured={tierData.featured}
   227â†’            />

   229â†’        ))}

   232â†’  )
   233â†’}

1â†’# Quick Spec: 3-Tier Pricing Section
     2â†’
     3â†’## Overview
     4â†’
     5â†’Build a 3-tier pricing section component with Starter, Professional, and Enterprise cards following the design reference (03-pricing.png). This component will provide a reusable pricing display for the application with three distinct tiers, each with customizable pricing, features, and call-to-action buttons.
     6â†’
     7â†’## Workflow Type
     8â†’
     9â†’Feature implementation - Creating a new reusable UI component for pricing tier display.
    10â†’

    15â†’- `frontend/src/components/ui/index.ts` - Export PricingSection component
    16â†’
    17â†’### Change Details
    18â†’Create a reusable PricingSection component with:
    19â†’- **PricingCard**: Base card component for individual pricing tiers with:
    20â†’  - Tier name (Starter, Professional, Enterprise)
    21â†’  - Price display
    22â†’  - Features list
    23â†’  - CTA button
    24â†’  - Optional highlight/featured styling for Professional tier
    25â†’- **PricingSection**: Container component that renders all three tiers in a responsive grid layout
    26â†’
    27â†’Style using Material-UI `styled` API and follow existing component patterns (similar to Card, KPICard).
    28â†’
    29â†’## Success Criteria
    30â†’
    31â†’- [ ] Component renders all three pricing tiers (Starter, Professional, Enterprise)
    32â†’- [ ] Professional tier is highlighted/featured
    33â†’- [ ] Responsive layout works on mobile and desktop
    34â†’- [ ] Button styling matches existing Button component patterns
    35â†’- [ ] No TypeScript errors
    36â†’- [ ] Component is properly exported from ui/index.ts
    37â†’
    38â†’### Implementation Notes
    39â†’- Use MUI Card as base component like other UI components
    40â†’- Professional tier should have visual distinction (e.g., shadow, scale, or highlight)
    41â†’- Features list should be flexible (array of strings)
    42â†’- CTA button text is customizable

1â†’import { Card as MuiCard, CardContent, Box, Typography, Grid, SxProps, Theme } from '@mui/material'

     3â†’import { Button } from './Button'
     4â†’
     5â†’interface PricingCardProps {
     6â†’  tier: string
     7â†’  price: string | number
     8â†’  features: string[]
     9â†’  buttonText: string
    10â†’  onButtonClick?: () => void
    11â†’  featured?: boolean
    12â†’  description?: string
    13â†’  sx?: SxProps<Theme>
    14â†’}
    15â†’
    16â†’const StyledPricingCard = styled(MuiCard, {
    17â†’  shouldForwardProp: (prop) => prop !== 'featured',
    18â†’})<{ featured?: boolean }>(({ theme, featured }) => ({
    19â†’  borderRadius: 16,
    20â†’  transition: 'all 200ms ease-out',
    21â†’  height: '100%',
    22â†’  display: 'flex',
    23â†’  flexDirection: 'column',
    24â†’  ...(featured && {
    25â†’    transform: 'scale(1.05)',
    26â†’    boxShadow: `0 20px 40px ${alpha(theme.palette.primary.main, 0.3)}`,
    27â†’    border: `2px solid ${theme.palette.primary.main}`,
    28â†’  }),
    29â†’  ...(!featured && {
    30â†’    border: `1px solid ${alpha(theme.palette.divider, 0.1)}`,
    31â†’    boxShadow: theme.shadows[1],
    32â†’  }),
    33â†’  '&:hover': {
    34â†’    boxShadow: featured ? `0 24px 48px ${alpha(theme.palette.primary.main, 0.4)}` : theme.shadows[4],
    35â†’  },
    36â†’}))
    37â†’
    38â†’export function PricingCard({
    39â†’  tier,
    40â†’  price,
    41â†’  features,
    42â†’  buttonText,
    43â†’  onButtonClick,
    44â†’  featured = false,
    45â†’  description,
    46â†’  ...props
    47â†’}: PricingCardProps) {
    48â†’  return (
    49â†’    <StyledPricingCard featured={featured} {...props}>
    50â†’      <CardContent sx={{ p: 3, pb: 2, flexGrow: 1 }}>
    51â†’        {featured && (
    52â†’          <Box
    53â†’            sx={{
    54â†’              display: 'inline-block',
    55â†’              px: 1.5,
    56â†’              py: 0.5,
    57â†’              borderRadius: 2,
    58â†’              bgcolor: alpha('#2196F3', 0.1),
    59â†’              mb: 1.5,
    60â†’            }}
    61â†’          >
    62â†’            <Typography
    63â†’              variant="caption"
    64â†’              sx={{
    65â†’                color: 'primary.main',
    66â†’                fontWeight: 700,
    67â†’                textTransform: 'uppercase',
    68â†’                fontSize: '0.7rem',
    69â†’              }}
    70â†’            >
    71â†’              Most Popular
    72â†’            </Typography>
    73â†’          </Box>
    74â†’        )}
    75â†’
    76â†’        <Typography
    77â†’          variant="h6"
    78â†’          sx={{
    79â†’            fontWeight: 700,
    80â†’            color: 'text.primary',
    81â†’            mb: 1,
    82â†’          }}
    83â†’        >
    84â†’          {tier}
    85â†’        </Typography>
    86â†’
    87â†’        {description && (
    88â†’          <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary" sx={{ mb: 2 }}>
    89â†’            {description}
    90â†’          </Typography>
    91â†’        )}
    92â†’
    93â†’        <Box sx={{ mb: 2 }}>
    94â†’          <Typography
    95â†’            variant="h3"
    96â†’            sx={{
    97â†’              fontWeight: 700,
    98â†’              color: 'text.primary',
    99â†’              lineHeight: 1.2,
   100â†’            }}
   101â†’          >
   102â†’            {price}
   103â†’          </Typography>
   104â†’          {typeof price === 'number' && (
   105â†’            <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">
   106â†’              per month
   107â†’            </Typography>
   108â†’          )}
   109â†’        </Box>
   110â†’
   111â†’        <Typography
   112â†’          variant="subtitle2"
   113â†’          sx={{
   114â†’            fontWeight: 600,
   115â†’            color: 'text.primary',
   116â†’            mb: 1.5,
   117â†’            mt: 2,
   118â†’          }}
   119â†’        >
   120â†’          Features
   121â†’        </Typography>
   122â†’
   123â†’        <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', gap: 1, mb: 3 }}>
   124â†’          {features.map((feature, index) => (
   125â†’            <Box key={index} sx={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'flex-start', gap: 1 }}>
   126â†’              <Box
   127â†’                sx={{

1â†’# Quick Spec: 3-Tier Pricing Section
     2â†’
     3â†’## Overview
     4â†’
     5â†’Build a 3-tier pricing section component with Starter, Professional, and Enterprise cards following the design reference (03-pricing.png). This component will provide a reusable pricing display for the application with three distinct tiers, each with customizable pricing, features, and call-to-action buttons.
     6â†’
     7â†’## Workflow Type
     8â†’
     9â†’Feature implementation - Creating a new reusable UI component for pricing tier display.
    10â†’
    11â†’## Task Scope
    12â†’
    13â†’### Files to Modify/Create
    14â†’- `frontend/src/components/ui/PricingSection.tsx` - New component with pricing card variants
    15â†’- `frontend/src/components/ui/index.ts` - Export PricingSection component
    16â†’
    17â†’### Change Details
    18â†’Create a reusable PricingSection component with:
    19â†’- **PricingCard**: Base card component for individual pricing tiers with:
    20â†’  - Tier name (Starter, Professional, Enterprise)
    21â†’  - Price display
    22â†’  - Features list
    23â†’  - CTA button
    24â†’  - Optional highlight/featured styling for Professional tier
    25â†’- **PricingSection**: Container component that renders all three tiers in a responsive grid layout
    26â†’
    27â†’Style using Material-UI `styled` API and follow existing component patterns (similar to Card, KPICard).
    28â†’
    29â†’## Success Criteria
    30â†’
    31â†’- [ ] Component renders all three pricing tiers (Starter, Professional, Enterprise)
    32â†’- [ ] Professional tier is highlighted/featured
    33â†’- [ ] Responsive layout works on mobile and desktop
    34â†’- [ ] Button styling matches existing Button component patterns
    35â†’- [ ] No TypeScript errors
    36â†’- [ ] Component is properly exported from ui/index.ts
    37â†’
    38â†’### Implementation Notes
    39â†’- Use MUI Card as base component like other UI components
    40â†’- Professional tier should have visual distinction (e.g., shadow, scale, or highlight)
    41â†’- Features list should be flexible (array of strings)
    42â†’- CTA button text is customizable
    43â†’

    29â†’  ...(!featured && {

    38â†’export function PricingCard({

    52â†’          <Box
    53â†’            sx={{

   134â†’                  alignItems: 'center',
   135â†’                  justifyContent: 'center',

   138â†’                  fontWeight: 700,
   139â†’                }}
   140â†’              >
   141â†’                âœ“
   142â†’              </Box>
   143â†’              <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary" sx={{ pt: 0.25 }}>
   144â†’                {feature}
   145â†’              </Typography>
   146â†’            </Box>

   148â†’        </Box>
   149â†’      </CardContent>
   150â†’
   151â†’      <Box sx={{ px: 3, pb: 3 }}>
   152â†’        <Button
   153â†’          fullWidth
   154â†’          variant={featured ? 'primary' : 'secondary'}

   168â†’

   182â†’  {

   214â†’export function PricingSection({ spacing = 3, sx }: PricingSectionProps) {

   216â†’    <Box sx={sx}>

1â†’import { Card as MuiCard, CardContent, CardHeader, CardActions, Box, Typography, Skeleton, SxProps, Theme } from '@mui/material'
     2â†’import { styled, alpha } from '@mui/material/styles'
     3â†’import TrendingUpIcon from '@mui/icons-material/TrendingUp'
     4â†’import TrendingDownIcon from '@mui/icons-material/TrendingDown'
     5â†’import TrendingFlatIcon from '@mui/icons-material/TrendingFlat'
     6â†’
     7â†’interface BaseCardProps {
     8â†’  children: React.ReactNode
     9â†’  className?: string
    10â†’  onClick?: () => void
    11â†’  hoverable?: boolean
    12â†’  sx?: SxProps<Theme>

    14â†’
    15â†’const StyledCard = styled(MuiCard, {
    16â†’  shouldForwardProp: (prop) => prop !== 'hoverable',
    17â†’})<{ hoverable?: boolean }>(({ theme, hoverable }) => ({
    18â†’  borderRadius: 12,
    19â†’  transition: 'all 200ms ease-out',
    20â†’  cursor: hoverable ? 'pointer' : 'default',
    21â†’  ...(hoverable && {
    22â†’    '&:hover': {
    23â†’      transform: 'translateY(-2px)',
    24â†’      boxShadow: theme.shadows[4],
    25â†’    },
    26â†’  }),

    28â†’
    29â†’export function Card({ children, hoverable = false, onClick, ...props }: BaseCardProps) {
    30â†’  return (
    31â†’    <StyledCard hoverable={hoverable} onClick={onClick} {...props}>

    33â†’    </StyledCard>
    34â†’  )
    35â†’}
    36â†’

    38â†’  background: alpha(theme.palette.background.paper, 0.85),

    43â†’}))
    44â†’
    45â†’export function GlassCardComponent({ children, ...props }: BaseCardProps) {

    47â†’}
    48â†’
    49â†’interface KPICardProps {
    50â†’  title: string
    51â†’  value: string | number
    52â†’  trend?: number
    53â†’  trendLabel?: string
    54â†’  icon?: React.ReactNode

    58â†’}
    59â†’
    60â†’export function KPICard({
    61â†’  title,
    62â†’  value,
    63â†’  trend,
    64â†’  trendLabel,
    65â†’  icon,
    66â†’  loading = false,
    67â†’  color = 'primary',
    68â†’  onClick,
    69â†’}: KPICardProps) {
    70â†’  const getTrendIcon = () => {
    71â†’    if (trend === undefined) return null
    72â†’    if (trend > 0) return <TrendingUpIcon fontSize="small" sx={{ color: 'success.main' }} />
    73â†’    if (trend < 0) return <TrendingDownIcon fontSize="small" sx={{ color: 'error.main' }} />
    74â†’    return <TrendingFlatIcon fontSize="small" sx={{ color: 'text.secondary' }} />
    75â†’  }
    76â†’
    77â†’  const getTrendColor = () => {
    78â†’    if (trend === undefined) return 'text.secondary'
    79â†’    if (trend > 0) return 'success.main'
    80â†’    if (trend < 0) return 'error.main'
    81â†’    return 'text.secondary'
    82â†’  }
    83â†’
    84â†’  if (loading) {
    85â†’    return (
    86â†’      <StyledCard>

    90â†’          <Skeleton width={60} height={16} sx={{ mt: 1 }} />
    91â†’        </CardContent>
    92â†’      </StyledCard>
    93â†’    )
    94â†’  }
    95â†’
    96â†’  return (
    97â†’    <StyledCard hoverable={!!onClick} onClick={onClick} sx={{ cursor: onClick ? 'pointer' : 'default' }}>
    98â†’      <CardContent sx={{ p: 2.5 }}>
    99â†’        <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'flex-start', justifyContent: 'space-between' }}>
   100â†’          <Box>
   101â†’            <Typography
   102â†’              variant="body2"
   103â†’              sx={{
   104â†’                color: 'text.secondary',
   105â†’                fontWeight: 500,
   106â†’                fontSize: '0.8rem',
   107â†’                mb: 0.5,
   108â†’              }}
   109â†’            >
   110â†’              {title}
   111â†’            </Typography>
   112â†’            <Typography
   113â†’              variant="h4"
   114â†’              sx={{
   115â†’                fontWeight: 700,
   116â†’                color: 'text.primary',
   117â†’                lineHeight: 1.2,
   118â†’              }}
   119â†’            >
   120â†’              {value}
   121â†’            </Typography>
   122â†’          </Box>
   123â†’          {icon && (
   124â†’            <Box
   125â†’              sx={{
   126â†’                p: 1,
   127â†’                borderRadius: 2,
   128â†’                bgcolor: `${color}.main`,
   129â†’                color: 'white',
   130â†’                display: 'flex',
   131â†’                alignItems: 'center',
   132â†’                justifyContent: 'center',
   133â†’              }}
   134â†’            >
   135â†’              {icon}
   136â†’            </Box>
   137â†’          )}
   138â†’        </Box>
   139â†’        {trend !== undefined && (
   140â†’          <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: 0.5, mt: 1.5 }}>
   141â†’            {getTrendIcon()}
   142â†’            <Typography
   143â†’              variant="caption"

   145â†’            >
   146â†’              {trend > 0 ? '+' : ''}{trend}%
   147â†’            </Typography>
   148â†’            {trendLabel && (
   149â†’              <Typography variant="caption" sx={{ color: 'text.secondary' }}>
   150â†’                {trendLabel}
   151â†’              </Typography>
   152â†’            )}
   153â†’          </Box>
   154â†’        )}
   155â†’      </CardContent>
   156â†’    </StyledCard>
   157â†’  )
   158â†’}
   159â†’
   160â†’interface FeatureCardProps {
   161â†’  icon: React.ReactNode

export function Button({
  variant = 'primary',
  loading = false,
  icon,
  iconPosition = 'start',
  children,
  disabled,

}: ButtonProps) {
  const getMuiVariant = (): MuiButtonProps['variant'] => {
    switch (variant) {
      case 'primary':
      case 'danger':
      case 'success':
        return 'contained'
      case 'secondary':
        return 'outlined'
      case 'tertiary':
        return 'text'
      default:
        return 'contained'
